Phobias babies scattered in all directions trying to find a way out 
of the base. T hey worked through every crack they could find. A 
handfull took a chance and scattered out the main exit. One of the 
babies jumped and clung to the side of the transport pod. another 
tried scurrying up the loading ramp amd into the entrance. It was 
thier function to survive and they wouldn't be erased by an oversized 
bugbomb.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> She opened her link, "ALL BOTS OUT OF THE BASE NOW! MOVE IT! YOU'VE 
> GOT 30 SECONDS!"
> 
> She activated the transport pod by remote and had it land near her. 
> The supplies were loaded. DarkMouse was already next to her. 
> GoldenEye got the transmission and ran over to the pod. 
> 
> "GET OUT OF THE BASE NOW! QUICKSTRIKE! DOLLEN! BLUDGEON! OBSIDIAN! 
> WAR! FAMINE! DRILLBIT! THE BASE WILL BLOW IN 25 SECONDS, GET OUT 
NOW!"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> > Destructor flew back to the base. He walked in and looked at his 
> old ship. He 
> > would miss it. He dl the last of the computer data and flew off. 
He 
> had not 
> > seen kit Kat but he sent a comm if she was in there.."Move Kit 
> Kat..You got 
> > about 30 sec before the base goes up."
